privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction.title: 1. Introduction
privacy.introduction.text1: Central KYC Portal ('we', 'our', or 'us') is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Know Your Customer (KYC) verification services.
privacy.introduction.text2: Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the platform.
privacy.collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
privacy.collection.intro: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.collection.item1: Personal identification information (name, date of birth, address, phone number, email address)
privacy.collection.item2: Government-issued identification documents (passport, driver's license, national ID)
privacy.collection.item4: Financial information as required for KYC compliance
privacy.collection.item5: Technical data (IP address, browser type, device information, usage data)
privacy.usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
privacy.usage.intro: We use the information we collect to:
privacy.usage.item1: Verify your identity and comply with KYC regulations
privacy.usage.item2: Prevent fraud, money laundering, and other illegal activities
privacy.usage.item3: Improve our services and develop new features
privacy.usage.item4: Communicate with you about our services
privacy.usage.item5: Comply with legal obligations and regulatory requirements
privacy.sharing.title: 4. Information Sharing and Disclosure
privacy.sharing.intro: We may share your information in the following circumstances:
privacy.sharing.item1: With authorized third parties who assist in providing our services
privacy.sharing.item2: With regulatory authorities and law enforcement when required by law
privacy.sharing.item3: With financial institutions as part of KYC verification processes
privacy.sharing.item4: In connection with a merger, sale, or acquisition of all or part of our company
privacy.security.title: 5. Data Security
privacy.security.text1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy.security.text2: These measures include encryption, access controls, secure data storage, and regular security assessments. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.retention.title: 6. Data Retention
privacy.retention.text: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this privacy policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law. KYC records are typically retained for 5-7 years in compliance with regulatory requirements.
privacy.rights.title: 7. Your Rights
privacy.rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy.rights.item1: Access: Request access to your personal data
privacy.rights.item2: Correction: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.rights.item3: Deletion: Request deletion of your personal data (subject to legal retention requirements)
privacy.rights.item4: Restriction: Request restriction of processing your personal data
privacy.rights.item5: Portability: Request transfer of your data to another service
privacy.rights.item6: Objection: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy.cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
privacy.cookies.text1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our platform and store certain information. Cookies help us improve your experience and provide personalized services.
privacy.cookies.text2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, some features of our service may not function properly without cookies.
privacy.thirdParty.title: 9. Third-Party Services
privacy.thirdParty.text: Our platform may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third parties. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.
privacy.changes.title: 10. Changes to This Privacy Policy
privacy.changes.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the 'Last Updated' date. You are advised to review this privacy policy periodically for any changes.
privacy.contact.title: 11. Contact Us
privacy.contact.text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
privacy.contact.addressValue: Central KYC Portal, Business District, Your City, Country
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.acceptance.text1: By accessing and using Central KYC Portal ('Service', 'Platform', 'we', 'us', or 'our'), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.acceptance.text2: If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, please do not use our Service. Your continued use of the Platform following the posting of changes to these terms will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.
terms.services.title: 2. Description of Services
terms.services.text1: Central KYC Portal provides Know Your Customer (KYC) verification services, including identity verification, document validation, risk assessment, and compliance screening services.
terms.services.text2: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our Service at any time without notice. We will not be liable to you or any third party for any modification, suspension, or discontinuance of the Service.
terms.account.title: 3. User Accounts
terms.account.intro: To access certain features of our Service, you must register for an account. You agree to:
terms.account.item1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information during registration
terms.account.item2: Maintain the security of your password and account credentials
terms.account.item3: Promptly notify us of any unauthorized use of your account
terms.account.item4: Be responsible for all activities that occur under your account
terms.kyc.title: 4. KYC Verification Process
terms.kyc.text1: By using our KYC services, you consent to the collection, processing, and verification of your personal information and documents as described in our Privacy Policy.
terms.kyc.item1: Accurate and truthful information about your identity
terms.kyc.item3: Any additional information required for compliance with applicable laws and regulations
terms.prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Activities
terms.prohibited.intro: You agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:
terms.prohibited.item1: Providing false, inaccurate, or misleading information
terms.prohibited.item2: Using the Service for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
terms.prohibited.item3: Attempting to bypass security measures or access restricted areas
terms.prohibited.item4: Interfering with or disrupting the Service or servers
terms.prohibited.item5: Using automated systems to access the Service without authorization
terms.prohibited.item6: Violating any applicable laws, regulations, or third-party rights
terms.intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property Rights
terms.intellectual.text1: All content, features, and functionality of the Service, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, icons, images, and software, are the exclusive property of Central KYC Portal and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.intellectual.text2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, or exploit any of our proprietary content without our express written permission.
terms.liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
terms.liability.text1: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Central KYC Portal shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, data, use, or goodwill.
terms.liability.text2: Our total liability to you for all claims arising from or related to the Service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim.
terms.indemnification.title: 8. Indemnification
terms.indemnification.text: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Central KYC Portal and its officers, directors, employees, and agents from any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, arising from your use of the Service or violation of these Terms.
terms.termination.title: 9. Termination
terms.termination.text1: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms of Service.
terms.termination.text2: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will cease immediately. All provisions of these Terms that by their nature should survive termination shall survive, including ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, and limitations of liability.
terms.warranty.title: 10. Disclaimer of Warranties
terms.warranty.text: The Service is provided on an 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' basis without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement. We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free.
terms.governing.title: 11. Governing Law
terms.governing.text: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which Central KYC Portal operates, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.dispute.title: 12. Dispute Resolution
terms.dispute.text1: Any dispute arising from or relating to these Terms or the Service shall first be resolved through good faith negotiations between the parties.
terms.dispute.text2: If the dispute cannot be resolved through negotiations, it shall be submitted to binding arbitration in accordance with the rules of the applicable arbitration association.
terms.changes.title: 13. Changes to Terms
terms.changes.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the effective date. Your continued use of the Service after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.contact.title: 14. Contact Information
terms.contact.text: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
terms.contact.addressValue: Central KYC Portal, Business District, Your City, Country
